name: Dream Tear - Elementar Rising
description:
Dream Tear - Elementar Rising

A VN/point n click/RPG Hybrid, game, about a team of Elementar (beings who use elements of many kinds), who venture to a planet known as Terraldyn. Their mission is to seek out remnants of a force known as Alien Ministry.

Original music,
voice acting
sprites,
Artwork
some, background work.
